endpoints.description: Submit a new industrial project for environmental analysis and assessment.
Retrieve the detailed analysis and compliance report of a specific industrial project.
Update the site-specific data of an existing project to reflect current metrics.
Remove an existing industrial project from the system.
Obtain a list of all supported environmental compliance standards and regulations.
Retrieve tailored mitigation strategies to improve environmental compliance for a project.
Submit new monitoring data (e.g., emissions and usage) for an ongoing project.
List all submitted projects along with their assessment statuses.
Retrieve aggregated statistics and trends across analyzed projects.
View alerts for critical environmental compliance breaches in a project.
